definition: common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Polish Pope John Paul II then pledged his obedience to the Freemasons.
sentences.chinese: 波兰籍的约翰保罗二世随后宣誓对共济会效忠。

sentences.english: The next most damaging piece of legislation was the Mobile Law.
sentences.chinese: 造成立法对共济会第二大伤害的是流动法。

sentences.english: The earliest version of this credo of the Freemasons , dates back to 1400.
sentences.chinese: 共济会的这种信条的最早版本可追溯到1400年。

sentences.english: And you said there were several Masons signed it, yeah?
sentences.chinese: 你说有一些共济会员签署了这份决议？

sentences.english: Today, the Knights Templar is the name of a branch of Freemasonry.
sentences.chinese: 如今，圣殿骑士已经成为共济会的一个分支的名字。

sentences.english: And he began expounding to Prince Andrey freemasonry , as he understood it.
sentences.chinese: 于是他开始向安德烈公爵叙述他所了解的共济会。
那是共济会的教义之一。

sentences.english: It seems that Freemasonry developed in Europe in the early eighteenth century.
sentences.chinese: 共济会似乎在十八世纪初叶在欧洲开始发展。

sentences.english: My aunt was surprised and hoped it was not some Freemason affair.
sentences.chinese: 舅妈有些惊讶，她希望不会又是共济会的什么破事。

sentences.english: My father would occasionally go to his Masonic lodge.
sentences.chinese: 我爸爸偶尔会到他的共济会分会那里去。

sentences.english: His heart wasn't in the mystic side of freemasonry .
sentences.chinese: 他的内心不处在共济会的神秘主义方面。

sentences.english: Mustering the last of his energy, Langdon made his way to the Masonic library.
sentences.chinese: 鼓起最后的勇气，兰登向共济会图书馆走去。

sentences.english: Both Prudential and Metropolitan Life have their origins in fraternalism.[28]
sentences.chinese: 保德信和大都会人寿均有着共济会社的渊源。

sentences.english: Is the Illuminati the same thing as Freemasonry?
sentences.chinese: 光明会和共济会是否同样的事情？

sentences.english: Do you wish under my sponsorship to enter the brotherhood of freemasons ?
sentences.chinese: 您是否愿意在我保证下加入共济会？
那是共济会教义的一部分。

definition: the Church (as Royal Court)/the Holy See/the Vatican

pinyin: You2 tai4 fu4 guo2 zhu3 yi4
